metadata.synopsis: One liner for a reporter at the desk next to the Steel Watcher on the ground floor of Baldurs Mouth.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to the reporters on the ground floor of the Baldur's Mouth building in CTY_Main_A

0.speaker: Glimmer Whistleborn
0.text: Can't write a bloody shopping list at the minute with all these eyes on me.

1.speaker: Glimmer Whistleborn
1.text: I'd hoped with Gortash dead the Steel Watch would have better things to do than cramp up our writer's room.

3.speaker: Glimmer Whistleborn
3.text: Dear reader: I was a fool.

2.speaker: Glimmer Whistleborn
2.text: How am I s'posed to write about Lord Gortash's life when I'm afeared for my own? Bloody Steel Watchers...

4.speaker: Glimmer Whistleborn
4.text: Don't know about you, but them big metal bastards really put me off my flow.
